attributes.action: change the tax system to allow people to earn up to £10,000 a year tax free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are people earning £200 a week being taxed?  It's ridiculous.  While there's people out there earning billions?  It's a disgrace.  Please sort this out, whether people sign this or not.  It's simply NOT FAIR.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
